sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_cs_conversation</collection> <condition>true</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>CA Record Insert</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var record = new GlideRecord('sn_ci_analytics_conversation'); var completedStates = gs.getProperty('sn_ci_analytics.analytic_conversation_completed_states', ''); record.initialize(); record.conversation = current.getValue('sys_id'); record.status = 'new'; record.consumer = current.consumer.sys_id; record.conversation_type = current.getValue('conversation_type'); record.conversation_closed_at = current.conversation_completed; record.conversation_created_at = current.sys_created_on; record.conversation_state = completedStates.includes(current.state) ? 'completed' : 'open'; record.insert(); })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-03 05:39:30</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0136ef01734310107d804c9885f6a7ec</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>36</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CA Record Insert</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">c53ca02a73c310108564b17afef6a7c0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">c53ca02a73c310108564b17afef6a7c0</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0136ef01734310107d804c9885f6a7ec</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-28 13:04:12</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>async</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0136ef01734310107d804c9885f6a7ec"/> </record_update>
